data.name: Poké Radar
data.summary: Use to track down rare or shiny Pokémon. 50 steps to recharge.
data.description: Designates several nearby patches of grass as containing Pokémon, some of which may be special radar-only Pokémon.  Successive uses in a certain way create chains of encounters with the same species; longer chains increase the chance that a shiny Pokémon of that species will appear.
